title: My Tube - Watch Videos, Not Distractions
description:
My Tube Features 🚀  |
✅ Block YouTube Shorts & Inline Shorts |
✅ Remove Distracting Video Suggestions & Homepage Recommendations | 
✅ Block Sponsored Ads | 
✅ Picture-in-Picture (PiP) Mode for Multitasking | 
✅ Volume Booster & Equalizer for Better Audio | 
✅ Content Filtering Based on Keywords | 
✅ Lightweight, Fast & Privacy-Friendly (No Data Collection) | 
🚀 Upcoming: Video Sharing with Friends! 🎬
